page.title: 10ROYAL SHREWSBURY HOSPITAL.
page.content: The Royal Shrewsbury Hospital was built in{1977}and has many different wards depending on the illness e.g. {Paediatric, Geriatric, Orthopeadic.}In an emergency they can evacuate some people who can be sent home to make room for more serious cases. Most nurses enjoy their work. One or two nurses might give up under {stress}but that's usually when they are student nurses and not fully {qualified. It costs 57 million pounds a year to run the Health Service in {Shropshire.}The ambulances do 1,290,518 miles a year. We interviewed a nurse who worked in the{Maternity}wards. She doesn't spend as much time as she'd like with the mums and babies. They always need new equipment, especially{CTG monitors which monitor the babies' heartbeat.
